text: I’m talking to a girl I like helping through her relationship problems. Cause I want the best for her😭
This guy putting a case on my phone at a store SCRATCHED MY SCREEN!
This kid on a plane asked her mom if she could use her crayons and the mom turned to her and said “no, these r my good crayons”
It’s always the people that seem the happiest that r most damaged
It's so cold outside, you could rob me with a bucket of water
Is being happy or sad an option?
Y'all ever be calm and and work yourself up just to send a good Snapchat video? 🤷🏻‍♂️
I used up all my sick days. I'mma just call in dead🤷🏻‍♂️
All I want to achieve is the ability to give  everyone I love everything they want♥️
I wish I had the confidence or whatever it is that @itsposttmalone has, to just be comfortable with himself and enjoy life
